verses.verse: God<WH430> stands<WH5324> in the congregation<WH5712> of the mighty<WH410>; he judges<WH8199> among<WH7130> the gods<WH430>.
How long will you judge<WH8199> unjustly<WH5766>, and accept<WH5375> the persons<WH6440> of the wicked<WH7563>? Selah<WH5542>.
Defend<WH8199> the poor<WH1800> and fatherless<WH3490>: do justice<WH6663> to the afflicted<WH6041> and needy<WH7326>.
Deliver<WH6403> the poor<WH1800> and needy<WH34>: rid<WH5337> them out of the hand<WH3027> of the wicked<WH7563>.
They know<WH3045> not<WH995>, neither will they understand; they walk<WH1980> on in darkness<WH2825>: all the foundations<WH4144> of the earth<WH776> are out of course<WH4131>.
I have said<WH559>, You are gods<WH430>; and all of you are sons<WH1121> of the most High<WH5945>.
But<WH403> you shall die<WH4191> like men<WH120>, and fall<WH5307> like one<WH259> of the princes<WH8269>.
Arise<WH6965>, O God<WH430>, judge<WH8199> the earth<WH776>: for you shall inherit<WH5157> all nations<WH1471>.
